Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2009 11:01PM shocker wrote: For the cold cap, go to penguincoldcap.com  I decided not to use this although I was offered this by my onc.  There is a 1% chance that the cancer could return to your scalp since the chemo would not get there.  While this is a small chance, I felt I did not want to risk it.  I had my first TCH treatment about 11 days ago.  It was hard.  My next one is next week.  I wonder if the side effects get worse.  I have also gained some weight.  Not fun.  No hair loss yet.  Wonder when that will start.  I was told that I would loose my hair after the second treatment.  Does everyone always loose hair??
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
